title: Climate Finance Advisors Acquisition Expands Sustainability - WSP
content: Climate Finance Advisors Acquisition Expands Sustainability  WSP
description: WSP is pleased to announce the acquisition of Washington D.C.-based Climate Finance Advisors (CFA), a prominent climate and finance consultancy specializing in climate-aligned investment. CFA adds industry-leading expertise to the firmâ€™s current offering and will help clients assess, understand and address climate-related financial and operational risks and opportunities.
